item.title: Research
item.description: Working papers A Measure of Core Wage Inflation (w/ Martín Almuzara and Davide Melcangi) [draft] Jul. 2023 Job Ladder, Human Capital, and the Cost of Job Loss (w/ Federica De Pace and Giulio Fella) [draft] Dec. 2022 Firm Dynamics and Random Search over the Business Cycle [draft] Revised Jul. 2023 - r&r Review of Economic Studies Self-Employment and Labor Market Risks [draft] Apr. 2021 - r&r International Economic Review Published Pathways towards Zero-Carbon Electricity Required for Climate Stabilization (w/ Adrien Vogt-Schilb, Céline Guivarch, and Alex Pfeiffer) Applied Energy, 225 (September 2018), pp.
